channel.title: Help?
channel.description: i want to make i store but i need to know how to make it where if you click talk (hans) then something pops up like the store interface please help?

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:7, topic:264278”]i fixed it nevermind[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2009, 06:21:47 pm[/size][hr]can you help me with 2 more things?
if so on my deltascape source everytime someone logs out they lose there d scim?
and my void melee works but void range doesn’t how can i add how high it hits?[/quote]

The Dragon Scimitar problem is that the player hasn’t completed the Monkey Madness quest. If the quest has not been deleted, the D scim methods automatically delete it. Simply remove the requirement of the quest.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:1, topic:264278”]i want to make i store but i need to know how to make it where
if you click talk (hans) then something pops up like
the store interface please help?[/quote]

Add the shop in shops.cfg.

You add the NPC clicking via packet 155, or you may add it in packet 17 (Second NPC option, trade):

if (NPCID == 0) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOPID; }

Replace “SHOPID” with the ID of the shop you made in shops.cfg.

Read full topic
